profile.name: Nagaraju Reddy Boggala
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.summary: Software Developer with nearly 3 years of hands-on experience in backend development, infrastructure management, and system reliability. Experienced in building secure, high-performance, and highly available distributed systems using Python, Flask, Docker and Kubernetes. Skilled in optimizing performance, scalability, and observability across microservices, caching, and messaging systems in enterprise environments.

description: Enhanced platform reliability and security by designing and implementing highly available caching and messaging systems, including Memcached, Redis Sentinel, and Valkey, all integrated with TLS encryption for secure data handling.

Boosted RabbitMQ performance and security by developing a batch message consumer that improved throughput by 200%, implementing mutual TLS (mTLS) with x.509 client certificates, and resolving critical security vulnerabilities to achieve enterprise-grade compliance.

Strengthened system observability by setting up Prometheus-Grafana-based monitoring and alerting for both RabbitMQ (single and HA setups) and system-level metrics, providing real-time visibility into performance and stability.
Modernized microservice architecture by upgrading key third-party components like Pydantic, Flask, and Flask-OpenAPI, ensuring better maintainability, compatibility, and performance across services.
Implemented persistent storage solutions using Longhorn for stateful workloads on bare-metal Kubernetes, ensuring fault tolerance and data durability across container and node restarts.

Led end-to-end infrastructure initiatives as a solo contributor, tackling complex challenges across caching, messaging, storage, and TLS, and ensuring production-grade availability, scalability, and resilience under high-load conditions.
